alert.note: Alert for Iberia; Lafayette; Upper St. Martin; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 3:34PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Iberia, southeastern Lafayette, northeastern Vermilion and west central St. Martin Parishes through 415 PM CDT... At 334 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cade, or near St. Martinville, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, New Iberia, Abbeville, Scott, St. Martinville, Broussard, Youngsville, Erath, Delcambre, Maurice, Cade, Acadiana Regional Airport, Jefferson Island, Coteau and Milton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Iberia; Lafayette; Upper St. Martin; Vermilion
